user_instruction: 'Send Ethan the details for the book cover design (ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com). You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Book Cover Design Details for "Whispers of the Past"

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me the full details and any relevant guidelines for the “Whispers of the Past” cover design? If it’s helpful, you can pull the information from your Notion workspace.

Please forward everything to ethan.designs@freelancegfx.com at your earliest convenience so I can begin working on initial concepts.

Thank you very much!

Best regards,
Ethan

final_output:
